scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:app && npm run typecheck:scripts
scripts.test:security: cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run rbac:lint && cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run auth:smoke && cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run rbac:smoke && cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run user:rbac:smoke && cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run learner:smoke && cross-env SKIP_RATE_LIMIT=1 npm run certificates:smoke
scripts.test:setup: npx tsx scripts/test-db-reset.ts && npx tsx scripts/test-seed.ts
scripts.fe:test: npx playwright test tests/e2e/auth.spec.ts tests/e2e/rbac-tenant.spec.ts tests/e2e/admin-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/instructor-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/learner-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/reports.spec.ts tests/e2e/routing-crawl.spec.ts
scripts.fe:test:headed: npx playwright test tests/e2e/auth.spec.ts tests/e2e/rbac-tenant.spec.ts tests/e2e/admin-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/instructor-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/learner-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/reports.spec.ts tests/e2e/routing-crawl.spec.ts --headed
scripts.fe:test:smoke: npx playwright test tests/e2e/auth.spec.ts tests/e2e/rbac-tenant.spec.ts tests/e2e/admin-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/instructor-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/learner-flows.spec.ts tests/e2e/reports.spec.ts
scripts.fe:scan:smoke: npx playwright test tests/e2e/scan/scan.routes.spec.ts tests/e2e/scan/scan.admin.spec.ts tests/e2e/scan/scan.instructor.spec.ts tests/e2e/scan/scan.learner.spec.ts
scripts.test:ci: npm run routes:audit && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e:fast
scripts.checkup:full: npm run checkup:fast && npm run checkup:rbac && npm run checkup:tenant && npm run checkup:exports && npm run checkup:e2e && npm run checkup:perf
scripts.checkup:fast: npm run smoke && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.checkup:rbac: npm run rbac:smoke && npm run user:rbac:smoke && tsx scripts/check-rbac-matrix.ts
scripts.scan:all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run scan:deps && npm run routes:audit && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:security && npm run checkup:rbac && npm run test:setup && npm run test:auth-states && npm run fe:scan && npm run fe:test
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start" "cd services/api && ../../services/api/venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
